property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, your opponent reveals their hand, then you choose a number. Then your opponent chooses one of the following and you use that ability: ▶ Your opponent discards all cards in their hand that cost the same as that chosen number. Then destroy all your opponent's creatures that cost the same as that chosen number: ▶ Your opponent discards all cards in their hand that don't have the same cost as the chosen number. Then destroy all your opponent's creatures that don't have the same cost as the chosen number.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you summon this creature, search your deck. You may reveal up to 2 spells that cost 6 or less from among them. Then shuffle your deck.
